Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center

Near the Nishinakajima Bridge between merchant town Hakata and castle town Fukuoka, Nissay Kyushu had opened since 1909. The structure was designed by Tatsuno Kataoka design office. As same as Tokyo station Marunouchi area, Kingo Tatsuno designed it. This architecture is English Queen Anne style. As the Fukuoka city history museum since 1972. Engineer Cafe opened on August 21st in 2019. Many tourists and engineers are visiting here today.

Engineer Cafe

Engineers getting together, active, and grow up in Fukuoka. As part of the â€œEngineer Friendly City Fukuokaâ€, inside of Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center, this facility opened on August 21 in 2019. We would like to provide various opportunities for a wide variety of people by enabling engineers to expand their range of more advanced challenges and skills. A facility for engineers born in the public and private sectors.

Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center

Near the Nishinakajima Bridge between merchant town Hakata and castle town Fukuoka, Nissay Kyushu had opened since 1909. The structure was designed by Tatsuno Kataoka design office. As same as Tokyo station Marunouchi area, Kingo Tatsuno designed it. This architecture is English Queen Anne style. As the Fukuoka city history museum since 1972. Engineer Cafe opened on August 21st in 2019. Many tourists and engineers are visiting here today.

Engineer Cafe

Engineers getting together, active, and grow up in Fukuoka. As part of the â€œEngineer Friendly City Fukuokaâ€, inside of Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center, this facility opened on August 21 in 2019. We would like to provide various opportunities for a wide variety of people by enabling engineers to expand their range of more advanced challenges and skills. A facility for engineers born in the public and private sectors.

About this event

Once Again, Feel the Excitement! Announcement of the Big LT Event & Year-End Party!

Before the COVID-19 pandemic, Fukuoka was bustling with diverse and active community activities and numerous offline events. However, as you know, we faced a situation where we had to temporarily refrain from activities.

Even in such difficult circumstances, we would like to take this opportunity to express our heartfelt gratitude to all of you who have made efforts to keep the "light" of the community alive.

Now that the situation has stabilized, we have decided to hold an event combining numerous passionate "LT (Lightning Talks)" and a "Year-End Party" to bring this enthusiasm to life!

Please look forward to reuniting after a long time, new encounters, and many passionate LTs!

Overview

Item Content
Date and Time December 12, 2025 (Friday)
Reception starts at 18:00 ãƒ» Starts at 18:30
Venue Fukuoka Prefecture, Fukuoka City, Chuo Ward, Daimyo 2-6-50
Fukuoka Daimyo Garden City 16F

Co-sponsoring Companies

This event is co-hosted by the following five companies:

  • KINTOãƒ†ã‚¯ãƒãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒ¼ã‚ºæ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾
  • æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾ãƒˆãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ«ã‚«ãƒ³ãƒ‘ãƒ‹ãƒ¼
  • æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾ãƒŒãƒ¼ãƒ©ãƒœ
  • æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾ãƒãƒãƒ¼ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰
  • LINEãƒ¤ãƒ•ãƒ¼æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾

Regarding the recruitment of speakers

Regarding the recruitment of speakers

We are also recruiting LT speakers!
This time, we have created slots for each genre, so please apply for the slot you would like to speak in!

Please note that each person is limited to one slot.
Please put your "passion" into 5 minutes and help liven up the venue!

LT presentation slot introduction

  • ğŸ”¥ AI slot: A track introducing knowledge and initiatives related to AI technologies such as machine learning, deep learning, and LLM.
  • ğŸ”° Beginner Track: A track for those who are presenting for the first time.
  • ğŸ’» Backend slot: A track dealing with backend technologies such as server-side languages, architecture, and databases.
  • ğŸ“š Frontend slot: A track dealing with technologies visible to users, such as UI/UX, JavaScript frameworks, and web design.
  • ğŸ“± Mobile slot: A track focused on iOS and Android app development, and cross-platform technologies.
  • âš™ï¸ SRE/Infra slot: A track for presentations on improving service reliability, cloud infrastructure, monitoring, and automation.
  • ğŸ” QA slot: A track dealing with quality assurance, testing, debugging methods, and development process improvement.
  • ğŸ‘¯ Management slot: A track dealing with team building, project management, organizational management, and product management.
  • ğŸ» Community slot: A track for those running communities in Fukuoka.
  • ğŸ“ˆ Data Science slot: A track dealing with data analysis, statistical modeling, and business intelligence case studies.
  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ¨ Designer slot: A track dealing with graphic design, UX research, design thinking, and design in general.
  • ğŸ’â€â™‚ï¸ CRE/CS slot: A track dealing with Customer Reliability Engineering, customer support improvement, and customer experience.
  • ğŸ›ï¸ Hardware/Embedded slot: A track dealing with IoT, electronic work, embedded systems, and physical computing.
  • ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ« Career/Work style slot: A track dealing with experiences of changing jobs, skill improvement, remote work, side jobs, and work styles and careers.
  • ğŸŒ English Presentation slot: A track where the content and theme are free, but the presentation is conducted entirely in English.

About English Presentation Slot

For this slot, please prepare both "materials and presentations" in English.
Presenters are not limited to global members; Japanese people who want to speak in English are also very welcome!
Why not take this opportunity to challenge yourself in English?

Sponsor Presentation Slot

This is a slot for sponsor companies, so please be careful not to apply by mistake.

How to Enter the Venue

  • A QR code is required to enter the venue (pass through the gate to the office area).
  • Please take the escalator from the Meiji Street side towards the "Sky Lobby".
  • Reference: https://fukuoka-dgc.jp/floorguide/#section01
  • On the day, there will be staff in front of the gate, so please speak to them.
  • If you arrive late and the staff is not present, please notify us via the administrator's X account or through the connpass email.
  • Once you reach the 16th floor, please enter through the Money Forward Inc. event space "DONTAKU" (door 16H).

Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center

Near the Nishinakajima Bridge between merchant town Hakata and castle town Fukuoka, Nissay Kyushu had opened since 1909. The structure was designed by Tatsuno Kataoka design office. As same as Tokyo station Marunouchi area, Kingo Tatsuno designed it. This architecture is English Queen Anne style. As the Fukuoka city history museum since 1972. Engineer Cafe opened on August 21st in 2019. Many tourists and engineers are visiting here today.

Engineer Cafe

Engineers getting together, active, and grow up in Fukuoka. As part of the â€œEngineer Friendly City Fukuokaâ€, inside of Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center, this facility opened on August 21 in 2019. We would like to provide various opportunities for a wide variety of people by enabling engineers to expand their range of more advanced challenges and skills. A facility for engineers born in the public and private sectors.

Youâ€™ll take a real client brief, build a product in one hour using Vibe Coding, and pitch your results â€” practicing teamwork, AI collaboration, and product thinking along the way.

Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center

Near the Nishinakajima Bridge between merchant town Hakata and castle town Fukuoka, Nissay Kyushu had opened since 1909. The structure was designed by Tatsuno Kataoka design office. As same as Tokyo station Marunouchi area, Kingo Tatsuno designed it. This architecture is English Queen Anne style. As the Fukuoka city history museum since 1972. Engineer Cafe opened on August 21st in 2019. Many tourists and engineers are visiting here today.

Engineer Cafe

Engineers getting together, active, and grow up in Fukuoka. As part of the â€œEngineer Friendly City Fukuokaâ€, inside of Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center, this facility opened on August 21 in 2019. We would like to provide various opportunities for a wide variety of people by enabling engineers to expand their range of more advanced challenges and skills. A facility for engineers born in the public and private sectors.

Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center

Near the Nishinakajima Bridge between merchant town Hakata and castle town Fukuoka, Nissay Kyushu had opened since 1909. The structure was designed by Tatsuno Kataoka design office. As same as Tokyo station Marunouchi area, Kingo Tatsuno designed it. This architecture is English Queen Anne style. As the Fukuoka city history museum since 1972. Engineer Cafe opened on August 21st in 2019. Many tourists and engineers are visiting here today.

Engineer Cafe

Engineers getting together, active, and grow up in Fukuoka. As part of the â€œEngineer Friendly City Fukuokaâ€, inside of Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center, this facility opened on August 21 in 2019. We would like to provide various opportunities for a wide variety of people by enabling engineers to expand their range of more advanced challenges and skills. A facility for engineers born in the public and private sectors.

Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center Near the Nishinakajima Bridge between merchant town Hakata and castle town Fukuoka, Nissay Kyushu had opened since 1909. The structure was designed by Tatsuno Kataoka design office. As same as Tokyo station Marunouchi area, Kingo Tatsuno designed it. This architecture is English Queen Anne style. As the Fukuoka city history museum since 1972. Engineer Cafe opened on August 21st in 2019. Many tourists and engineers are visiting here today.

Engineer Cafe Engineers getting together, active, and grow up in Fukuoka. As part of the â€œEngineer Friendly City Fukuokaâ€, inside of Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center, this facility opened on August 21 in 2019. We would like to provide various opportunities for a wide variety of people by enabling engineers to expand their range of more advanced challenges and skills. A facility for engineers born in the public and private sectors.

Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center

Near the Nishinakajima Bridge between merchant town Hakata and castle town Fukuoka, Nissay Kyushu had opened since 1909. The structure was designed by Tatsuno Kataoka design office. As same as Tokyo station Marunouchi area, Kingo Tatsuno designed it. This architecture is English Queen Anne style. As the Fukuoka city history museum since 1972. Engineer Cafe opened on August 21st in 2019. Many tourists and engineers are visiting here today.

Engineer Cafe

Engineers getting together, active, and grow up in Fukuoka. As part of the â€œEngineer Friendly City Fukuokaâ€, inside of Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center, this facility opened on August 21 in 2019. We would like to provide various opportunities for a wide variety of people by enabling engineers to expand their range of more advanced challenges and skills. A facility for engineers born in the public and private sectors.

Donghee Na, a Leading Figure in Global Python Development, is Coming to Fukuoka!

Donghee Na, a Python core developer and a member of the Steering Council leading Python development, will be speaking! Donâ€™t miss this rare opportunity to ask him questions directly!

Event Overview

This event is a meetup designed for everyoneâ€”from beginners to experienced developersâ€”to learn and share knowledge about Python, data analysis, and machine learning.
We welcome anyone interested in Python, regardless of experience, position, or background! Engineers from various companies using Python will share behind-the-scenes insights and technical tips from their work. After the sessions, weâ€™ll have a networking event at the venue. We look forward to seeing you there!
This event is primarily intended for current engineers or students aspiring to become engineers who are involved in programming.

Event Details

ã€Dateã€‘Friday, November 21, 2025, 19:00â€“20:30 (Reception from 18:30)
ã€Venueã€‘LY Communications Corporation â€“ CafÃ© Space

ã€€(12F, JRJP Hakata Building, 8-1 Hakata Ekichuogai, Hakata-ku, Fukuoka)

Timetable

  • Simultaneous Japaneseâ€“English interpretation will be provided on site. If you wish to use the interpretation service, please bring a device with Zoom installed (such as a laptop or smartphone) and earphones.
  • The timetable and start times are subject to change.

Session & Speaker Introduction

Pre-Event Question Collection

Weâ€™re collecting questions in advance for the discussion session with Donghee Na! Please use the form below to submit any questions youâ€™d like to ask him.

Question Form: https://form.line.me/01K73EP982CMK0JZXRNT8BGTR2

Machine Learning Infrastructure Software Engineer. Member of the Python core-dev and Steering Council.

Yiyang Zhan



Organizer of Python Meetup Fukuoka. Developing the internal AI platform at LY.

Notes

  • The event content may later be featured on the organizerâ€™s blog or YouTube channel. Please note that participant names or photos may appear in such media.
  • This meetup is intended for technical exchange. Participation for purposes unrelated to knowledge sharing or networking is not allowed.
  • Personal information obtained through this event will be handled according to each companyâ€™s privacy policy. By participating, you agree to these terms.
    A post-event anonymous survey will be conducted to collect feedback about the sessions.

Anti-Harassment Policy

Harassment includes discrimination or behavior based on gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, appearance, body characteristics, human rights, religion, sexually explicit images or expressions in public spaces, threats, stalking, unwanted photography or recording, inappropriate physical contact, or any other offensive behavior.
Our event staff will not tolerate any form of harassment to ensure all participants can enjoy the event comfortably.
Please also be mindful when sharing session content, blog posts, or comments on social media to avoid such conduct.
If you witness or experience any harassment, please contact us through the â€œContact the Eventâ€ form on connpass.

Cancellation Policy

  • If your schedule changes and you can no longer attend, please cancel your registration promptly.
  • If your participation is deemed inappropriate for the eventâ€™s purpose, the organizers may cancel your registration.

Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center

Near the Nishinakajima Bridge between merchant town Hakata and castle town Fukuoka, Nissay Kyushu had opened since 1909. The structure was designed by Tatsuno Kataoka design office. As same as Tokyo station Marunouchi area, Kingo Tatsuno designed it. This architecture is English Queen Anne style. As the Fukuoka city history museum since 1972. Engineer Cafe opened on August 21st in 2019. Many tourists and engineers are visiting here today.

Engineer Cafe

Engineers getting together, active, and grow up in Fukuoka. As part of the â€œEngineer Friendly City Fukuokaâ€, inside of Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center, this facility opened on August 21 in 2019. We would like to provide various opportunities for a wide variety of people by enabling engineers to expand their range of more advanced challenges and skills. A facility for engineers born in the public and private sectors.

Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center

Near the Nishinakajima Bridge between merchant town Hakata and castle town Fukuoka, Nissay Kyushu had opened since 1909. The structure was designed by Tatsuno Kataoka design office. As same as Tokyo station Marunouchi area, Kingo Tatsuno designed it. This architecture is English Queen Anne style. As the Fukuoka city history museum since 1972. Engineer Cafe opened on August 21st in 2019. Many tourists and engineers are visiting here today.

Engineer Cafe

Engineers getting together, active, and grow up in Fukuoka. As part of the â€œEngineer Friendly City Fukuokaâ€, inside of Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center, this facility opened on August 21 in 2019. We would like to provide various opportunities for a wide variety of people by enabling engineers to expand their range of more advanced challenges and skills. A facility for engineers born in the public and private sectors.

Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center

Near the Nishinakajima Bridge between merchant town Hakata and castle town Fukuoka, Nissay Kyushu had opened since 1909. The structure was designed by Tatsuno Kataoka design office. As same as Tokyo station Marunouchi area, Kingo Tatsuno designed it. This architecture is English Queen Anne style. As the Fukuoka city history museum since 1972. Engineer Cafe opened on August 21st in 2019. Many tourists and engineers are visiting here today.

Engineer Cafe

Engineers getting together, active, and grow up in Fukuoka. As part of the â€œEngineer Friendly City Fukuokaâ€, inside of Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center, this facility opened on August 21 in 2019. We would like to provide various opportunities for a wide variety of people by enabling engineers to expand their range of more advanced challenges and skills. A facility for engineers born in the public and private sectors.

Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center

Near the Nishinakajima Bridge between merchant town Hakata and castle town Fukuoka, Nissay Kyushu had opened since 1909. The structure was designed by Tatsuno Kataoka design office. As same as Tokyo station Marunouchi area, Kingo Tatsuno designed it. This architecture is English Queen Anne style. As the Fukuoka city history museum since 1972. Engineer Cafe opened on August 21st in 2019. Many tourists and engineers are visiting here today.

Engineer Cafe

Engineers getting together, active, and grow up in Fukuoka. As part of the â€œEngineer Friendly City Fukuokaâ€, inside of Fukuoka City Akarenga Cultural Center, this facility opened on August 21 in 2019. We would like to provide various opportunities for a wide variety of people by enabling engineers to expand their range of more advanced challenges and skills. A facility for engineers born in the public and private sectors.
